pr_title: chore: Replace threeten backport dependency with java.time

timeline.message: chore: Replace threeten backport dependency with java.time

timeline.bodyText:
For better or worse, I've avoided _ in the other ones, so far.
How about just:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        desugar_jdk_libs: 'com.android.tools:desugar_jdk_libs:1.0.5',

timeline.author: jamesonwilliams

timeline.bodyText: We can move these into the afterEvaluate block inside the root project build.gradle, so that they get applied to all modules, and keep the module build.gradle slim and consistent.

timeline.message: Make sure Temporal.Time doesn't lose milliseconds
Move desugartools dependency to root so it applies to all modules
Make sure DateTime doesnt drop milliseconds
